featureType.name: arctic_accum_data_coverage
featureType.title: arctic_accum_data_coverage
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

latLonBoundingBox.crs: GEOGCS["WGS84(DD)", DATUM["WGS84", SPHEROID["WGS84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH]]

virtualTable.name: arctic_accum_data_coverage
virtualTable.sql: SELECT pp.id, CASE WHEN lp.twtt IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE NULL END,pp.geom FROM accum_point_paths AS pp JOIN accum_segments AS segs ON pp.segment_id=segs.id JOIN accum_seasons ss ON pp.season_id=ss.id JOIN accum_season_groups sgs ON ss.season_group_id=sgs.id LEFT JOIN accum_layer_points AS lp ON pp.id=lp.point_path_id AND (lp.layer_id = %layer_id% OR lp IS NULL) WHERE ss.location_id=%location_id% AND ss.name IN (%season_name%) AND sgs.id IN (%season_group_ids%) AND segs.name > %start_seg% AND segs.name < %stop_seg%
